function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High residential building density may facilitate disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control and prevent disease spread in high-density residential areas","Technologies":"Smart building technologies for air filtration and monitoring","People":"Residents, urban dwellers","Owner":"Local authorities, city planners"},{"Description":"High office and retail building density may lead to interzonal disease transmissions","Impact":"Potential for widespread disease transmission following in-person work and activities","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control and prevent disease spread in high-density office and retail areas","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, building ventilation systems","People":"Office workers, retail employees, city residents","Owner":"Business owners, city planners"},{"Description":"Building-level crowding and room-level crowding can facilitate disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within buildings and vulnerable communities","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control and prevent disease spread within buildings and vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Building occupancy monitoring systems, ventilation and air circulation systems","People":"Building residents, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Building owners, local authorities"}]}
